translation.en: -[guitar riff plays] -What up? This is gonna be sick.
translation.ja: サムが痛い目に遭うよ

translation.en: Sam, are you ready to get hurt?
translation.ja: 覚悟は？

translation.en: -Hell, yeah! Born ready. -[friends laugh]
translation.ja: 当然 できてる

translation.en: Sammy's gonna ring the doorbell of her ex-boyfriend,
translation.ja: 新しい女と暮らしてる元彼の家に突撃さ

translation.en: even though she knows his new girlfriend lives there right now.
translation.ja: 新しい女と暮らしてる元彼の家に突撃さ〝ピンポン泣き〞

translation.en: It's gonna be sick.
translation.ja: 超面白いはず

translation.en: -Let's get it! -[friends] Yeah!
translation.ja: 行くよ！

translation.en: Hey. What are you doing here?
translation.ja: サム　どうした？

translation.en: [energetically] I am still single, and last week,
translation.ja: 私は まだ独り身

translation.en: I made a fake Instagram account to stalk your girlfriend,
translation.ja: 彼女をネットストーキングしてやる

translation.en: and she's prettier than me!
translation.ja: 私より美人

translation.en: What the...
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: [yelling] Oh, my God! That hurt my heart so bad!
translation.ja: 痛い目に遭ったよ！

translation.en: Let's see that again in slow-mo. [laughs]
translation.ja: スローでもう一度！

translation.en: [slowed and distorted] I'm still single...
translation.ja: 私は まだ独り身

translation.en: -[friends] No! -No, no! Who cares?
translation.ja: サム　大丈夫だよ

translation.en: -[friend 1] It's okay! -[friend 2] You're everything!
translation.ja: サム　大丈夫だよ すぐにいい人が見つかるって

translation.en: -[Iliza sobs] -[friend 1] You--
translation.ja: すぐにいい人が見つかるって

translation.en: You're gonna find someone. You're gonna be good, and you know what?
translation.ja: すぐにいい人が見つかるって 幸せになれるさ

translation.en: Smol, dude, you're smol.
translation.ja: かわいいよ

translation.en: -[meekly] I'm smol. -[friend 3] And rare.
translation.ja: 本当に？ 個性的

translation.en: -And rare. -Yeah!
translation.ja: 私は個性的

translation.en: -Smol and rare! -[friends] Yeah!
translation.ja: 個性的でかわいい！

translation.en: -[whimsical music plays] -[female host] Meet the Shlesingers.
translation.ja: シュレシンガー夫妻

translation.en: Seemingly normal newlyweds on the outside,
translation.ja: 表向きは普通のカップル

translation.en: but with a twist, once you step inside their home.
translation.ja: でも 家の中では何かが違う

translation.en: No. She is not like other wives.
translation.ja: 彼女は特別だ

translation.en: -[frisbee splats] -Look alive! [barks]
translation.ja: 油断するな

translation.en: When we first started dating, she was this... How do you say it? Uh, girl?
translation.ja: 初めて出会った時は女性的だったが―

translation.en: But, since we got married... [chuckles]
translation.ja: 結婚後は変わったよ

translation.en: it's like she's my bro, and my wife.
translation.ja: 僕の“ダチ兼 妻”さ

translation.en: She's my husband-wife.
translation.ja: 夫でもある

translation.en: -[hands slap] -[gruff] Brothers.
translation.ja: ダチ！

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: [host] Husband Wife...
translation.ja: 「夫であり妻」

translation.en: an all-new docu-series on ISC.
translation.ja: 新たながドキュメンタリーが登場

translation.en: All right. [claps]
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: Let's get you jerked off so you're not horny at dinner.
translation.ja: 夕飯の前に手コキしてやる

translation.en: [female host] From their unconventional marriage dynamic...
translation.ja: 異例の夫婦関係が明らかになる

translation.en: -Whoa! Put your butt away! -[whimsical music fades] No one's trying to see that.
translation.ja: ケツを出すなよ！誰も見たくない

translation.en: [host] ...to their unexpected sleeping challenges.
translation.ja: 意外な睡眠の課題も

translation.en: [husband laughs] Yeah.
translation.ja: 参ったよ

translation.en: Sharing a bed with her is a whole thing.
translation.ja: ベッドを独占される

translation.en: -[lighthearted music plays] -You didn't flush!
translation.ja: 流してない

translation.en: This big. Do you see that?
translation.ja: 超デカいだろ？

translation.en: That's the size of a full-grown bass.
translation.ja: バスと同じ大きさだ

translation.en: That's my girl.
translation.ja: さすが僕の妻

translation.en: I love you.
translation.ja: 愛してる

translation.en: Don't you flush that.
translation.ja: 流すなよ

translation.en: Bass dump!
translation.ja: 絶対にダメだ

translation.en: -You want some fruit punch? -Sure.
translation.ja: 食べる？

translation.en: -[fruit thuds] -[husband] Oh!
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: [host] See how they attempt to navigate life... -as a normal couple... -Oh...
translation.ja: 普通の生活を送ろうとする２人を―

translation.en: [host] ...in a society that shuns their lifestyle.
translation.ja: 果たして社会は受け入れるのか？

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Oh, it got foamy.
translation.ja: 泡立っちゃった

translation.en: [host] ISC's Husband Wife.
translation.ja: 新番組をお楽しみに

translation.en: -Come on. -No,
translation.ja: 触って よせよ

translation.en: -come on, I... -Come on.
translation.ja: ほら

translation.en: [Iliza giggles] You feel that?
translation.ja: 感じるだろ？

translation.en: -Yeah. -That's our dinner.
translation.ja: 俺たちの夕食

translation.en: [host] Tuesday at one-ish on ISC.
translation.ja: 火曜日の１時頃に放送

translation.en: -[warbled] You wanna feel the chicken? -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 鶏肉を感じろよ

translation.en: -And you have a chicken. -[lighthearted music fades]
translation.ja: 鶏肉が入ってる！

translation.en: -[cheery music plays] -You may be wondering, "Do I need a catheter?"
translation.ja: カルーテルの件でお悩み？〝発送はしないので　取りに来て〞

translation.en: And the answer is, maybe.
translation.ja: 〝発送はしないので　取りに来て〞試してみたらどうです？

translation.en: Why not stick one in and see how you like it?
translation.ja: 気に入るかもしれませんよ

translation.en: -[dance music plays] -I'm Ellen Plebles, and this is week two
translation.ja: 私はエレンよ 前回に引き続き“デブの筋トレ”

translation.en: of the Ripped Fat Dudes workout.
translation.ja: 前回に引き続き“デブの筋トレ”

translation.en: A four-week program I designed to keep you in the best shape you can be
translation.ja: 最高の体形を維持できます

translation.en: as an adult male who eats peanut butter sandwiches in between meals.
translation.ja: おいしい食べ物をやめることなくね

translation.en: Let's meet some of our trainers.
translation.ja: 挑戦者は彼よ

translation.en: This is Joe. He's my advanced Ripped Fat Dude.
translation.ja: デブでムキムキのジョー

translation.en: Notice Joe's pecs are puffy.
translation.ja: 彼の胸筋に注目して

translation.en: Nebulous, shapeless. They're almost a full A cup.
translation.ja: たるんだ感じのＡカップよ

translation.en: Joe, tell everyone how you maintain that Ripped Fat Dude shape.
translation.ja: どうやって体形を維持してる？

translation.en: Well, I used to play baseball, I ate waffles
translation.ja: 毎日ワッフルを数個 食う

translation.en: -three to four times a day. -Nice, Joe.
translation.ja: 毎日ワッフルを数個 食う いいわよ

translation.en: -[hands clap] -Now let's blast through five grown-man push-ups slowly. Hit it.
translation.ja: それじゃ“オッサン腕立て伏せ”を

translation.en: -[exhales] -I want you to notice Joe's form.
translation.ja: 姿勢に注目よ

translation.en: See how he keeps it wide.
translation.ja: 腕が広がってる

translation.en: That way, he's guaranteed to get a jacked armpit, covered in stretch marks.
translation.ja: その結果肩に肉割れが生じるの

translation.en: This is the perfect workout to do at your niece's christening or in the parking lot of any Best Buy.
translation.ja: 家電量販店の駐車場でやるのがお薦めよ

translation.en: And when you're done, make sure to chug down one to two full-calorie Monster Energy drinks.
translation.ja: 運動後は栄養ドリンクを２本ほど飲んで

translation.en: [slaps back] Nice job, Joe.
translation.ja: いい感じよ

translation.en: Three... [exhales sharply] two... one.
Rest.
translation.ja: 休憩

translation.en: I always like to incorporate -[weight clatters] -an excruciatingly slow bicep curl
translation.ja: 私は二頭筋カールを超ゆっくりやる

translation.en: into every workout I do. Why? Because it does not burn any calories.
translation.ja: カロリーを まったく消費しない運動なの

translation.en: That way, you can get a ripped shoulder with a generous layer of fat covering it.
translation.ja: その結果 肩に厚い脂肪層ができるわ

translation.en: And that's how we're going to maintain that Ripped Fat Dude Physique.
translation.ja: そうやって太った体形を維持する

translation.en: Remember, the Ripped Fat Dude workout plan is all about adding bulk
translation.ja: 筋肉が割れないようにしながら

translation.en: without any definition.
translation.ja: 体を大きくしていくわ

translation.en: You wanna look like a potato that's been squeezed by thumbs.
translation.ja: ジャガイモっぽい体形を目指して

translation.en: We're talking Matt Damon in between movies, or Russell Crowe at his absolute peak.
translation.ja: 映画を撮る直前のＭ(マット)･デイモンの体が目標よ

translation.en: Make sure to down a 64-ounce Hot Sweat at every meal.
translation.ja: 食事の時は これを２リットル飲んでね

translation.en: Active recovery.
translation.ja: カロリー補充よ

translation.en: I'm Ellen Plebles. I'll see you Ripped Fat Dudes around.
translation.ja: 太った男性たち次回に また会いましょう

translation.en: And by around, I mean hanging out doing nothing
translation.ja: 太った男性たち次回に また会いましょう ジムに行っても突っ立ってるだけのデブたち

translation.en: on the perimeter of every MMA gym in South Boston.
translation.ja: ジムに行っても突っ立ってるだけのデブたち

translation.en: Let's get it.
translation.ja: 決めのポーズを

translation.en: We're here at Rick's Snake Farm. Shit's about to get real messed up
translation.ja: ここはスネークファームだよ

translation.en: -because I brought my friend, Liz... -Hi.
translation.ja: 彼女はリズ

translation.en: ...who wasn't invited because she and Sammy are kind of on the outs right now,
translation.ja: リズはサムの泊まりがけの誕生日会をドタキャン

translation.en: since Liz dropped out last minute to Sammy's 35th in Palm Springs,
translation.ja: リズはサムの泊まりがけの誕生日会をドタキャン それでサムが怒ってる

translation.en: but I'm pretty sure Liz still paid for the room.
translation.ja: でもリズは宿泊費を払ったから

translation.en: -I did. -So Sammy has no reason to still be upset.
translation.ja: でもリズは宿泊費を払ったから サムが怒る必要はない

translation.en: Either way, I did not text Sammy to let her know Liz was coming.
translation.ja: サムが怒る必要はない リズが来てるのをサムは… リズが来てるのをサムは…〝サプライズ泣き〞

translation.en: -You didn't tell her? -Let's do this.
translation.ja: 〝サプライズ泣き〞知らない？ 〝サプライズ泣き〞 〝サプライズ泣き〞始めよう

translation.en: I'd rather not.
translation.ja: マズい

translation.en: What's up? I'm Sammy Nashville, and we're at Rick's Snake Pit.
translation.ja: サムだよここはスネークファーム

translation.en: -We're gonna go get some snakes-- -Hey, Sammy!
translation.ja: やあ　サム！

translation.en: Hi, Liz.
translation.ja: リズ

translation.en: Hi.
translation.ja: 元気？

translation.en: I brought Liz.
translation.ja: 連れてきた

translation.en: I can see that.
translation.ja: だろうね

translation.en: -What did you do? -What?
translation.ja: 何なの？

translation.en: -Let's talk. -[friend] Okay.
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: -The show at my expense! -[Iliza] What's wrong with you?
translation.ja: 番組のために 私を犠牲に？

translation.en: -This is my show! -I get it, I get it! -[Iliza] She is a bitch-- -But whatever, she's our friend--
translation.ja: 彼女は最低な女だけど友達だろ？

translation.en: You guys, I'm standing, like, three feet away!
translation.ja: あんたたち 聞こえてるよ

translation.en: [friend] It was a sick-ass stunt that hurt everyone involved, even me.
translation.ja: 全員 不快に思ったけど最高のおふざけさ

translation.en: Next time, on Female Jackass, Stef's gonna tell me that everyone thinks I'm kind of a bitch. [sighs]
translation.ja: 次回は 私がイヤな女だとステフに告げられる

translation.en: But the truth is, if they just took a second to get to know me,
translation.ja: でも本当は分かってほしい

translation.en: they'd see that I'm actually really shy.
translation.ja: 私が内気な女だとね

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -♪ Look at those lips! ♪ ♪ And look at those feet! ♪
translation.ja: この子の唇と目を見て

translation.en: ♪ Which one is smaller? Your lips or your feet? ♪
translation.ja: どっちが小さい？足のほう？

translation.en: [male narrator] She was the greatest star in the world.
translation.ja: 世界的なスターだった彼女

translation.en: I'm your biggest fan!
translation.ja: あなたの大ファンです

translation.en: [narrator] One of the greatest songwriters in history.

translation.en: ♪ You are so tiny ♪ ♪ You've got a chubby little body ♪
translation.ja: 小さくて　　ぽっちゃりしたあなた

translation.en: ♪ And you've got a stinky fish mouth ♪
translation.ja: 口は魚の臭いがする

translation.en: ♪ I kiss you ♪ [kisses]
translation.ja: キスよ

translation.en: [interviewer] Your album is triple platinum,
translation.ja: 「失踪者たち」の　プロデューサー アルバムは大ヒットで賞も獲得 アルバムは大ヒットで賞も獲得

translation.en: -you've got 14 Grammys, -[crowd cheers faintly]
translation.ja: アルバムは大ヒットで賞も獲得

translation.en: sold out world tour.
translation.ja: コンサートも大成功

translation.en: You're the only artist to perform alongside her own hologram.
translation.ja: 自身のホログラムとも共演しました

translation.en: Tell me, how did this all start?
translation.ja: スターになったきっかけは？

translation.en: It was a long time ago...
translation.ja: ずっと前の話よ

translation.en: [Iliza] ♪ I frame your nose with my hand ♪
translation.ja: あなたの鼻をつかんで

translation.en: ♪ I squeeze your body ♪
translation.ja: 体をぎゅっとする

translation.en: ♪ Let's not pretend You're not made of meat ♪
translation.ja: その体は肉でできてるわ

translation.en: ♪ Your wrinkly poof ♪
translation.ja: シワもある

translation.en: -♪ Now shake that beat! ♪ -[glass clinks]
translation.ja: リズムを揺さぶってよ

translation.en: [falsetto] ♪ Tiniest doggy in the world ♪
translation.ja: 世界一 小さな犬

translation.en: ♪ Littlest doggy in the land ♪
translation.ja: この国で最も小さい

translation.en: ♪ Your body is made of meat ♪
translation.ja: 体が肉でできてる

translation.en: ♪ And your lips are made of beef ♪
translation.ja: その唇は牛肉ね

translation.en: [playfully] ♪ A creature that is meaty ♪ ♪ You do it With your neck beard ♪ ♪ And shake it With your neck beard ♪
translation.ja: 首に生えてる　　そのヒゲを振って

translation.en: ♪ And little paws Cha-cha-cha ♪ ♪ And little paws ♪
translation.ja: 小さな足でチャチャチャ

translation.en: ♪ Cha-cha-cha And cha-cha-cha ♪ ♪ And cha-cha-ch... ♪
translation.ja: チャチャチャ…

translation.en: You write that?
translation.ja: 君の曲か？

translation.en: I think you've got what it takes.
translation.ja: 君には才能がある

translation.en: Gee, I don't know, mister.
translation.ja: 自信がないわ

translation.en: I'm just a waitress who sings...
translation.ja: 私は ただのウエートレスよ

translation.en: tiny songs to her... tiny dog.
translation.ja: 小さな犬の歌しか歌えない

translation.en: There's someone I'd like you to meet.
translation.ja: 君に紹介したい

translation.en: Iliza, this is Buddy.
translation.ja: 彼はバディだ

translation.en: Oh, hi.
translation.ja: 元気？

translation.en: You think you could, uh... do one for him?
translation.ja: 彼にも曲を書いてくれ

translation.en: You've got a thick paw,
translation.ja: 足が厚いわね

translation.en: -[phone chimes] -and you know it's true.
translation.ja: 承知でしょ？

translation.en: You've got flappy lips,
translation.ja: 大きく動く唇

translation.en: and you know it's you.
translation.ja: それが あなたよ

translation.en: Now, shake that thick body. Shake that thick body.
translation.ja: さあ　体をフリフリして

translation.en: You've gotta share this gift...
translation.ja: 世界に見せつけろ

translation.en: with the world.
translation.ja: その才能を

translation.en: [narrator] The true story
translation.ja: 真実の物語

translation.en: of a once-in-a-lifetime talent.
translation.ja: 〝コンサート〞才能が輝き出す

translation.en: And all the dogs were there. I mean, the dogs are always there, but I was...
translation.ja: 犬たちがいつもいてくれたわ

translation.en: Oh. Pan Pan likes you.
translation.ja: パンパンがあなたを好きみたい

translation.en: [narrator] Full of love...
translation.ja: 本物の愛

translation.en: -and... -Iliza! ...betrayal.
translation.ja: そして 裏切り

translation.en: I wanna see my wife.
translation.ja: 妻は？

translation.en: -Sorry. -I'm her husband.
translation.ja: やめて 俺は夫だ

translation.en: She's with a fan right now.
translation.ja: 今 ファンといるの

translation.en: A fan?
translation.ja: ファン？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: ええ

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: -[camera shutters] -Thank you so much!
translation.ja: どうもありがとう

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -We love you! We love you!
translation.ja: この子からも愛を送るわ

translation.en: [narrator] Follow a star's meteoric rise...
translation.ja: 流星のごとく スターに

translation.en: ...and cosmic collapse.
translation.ja: 〝パンパン〞 しかし 隕石は墜落する しかし 隕石は墜落する

translation.en: -[grunts and slaps] -With unpredictable twists...
translation.ja: 予期せぬ出来事への遭遇

translation.en: [husband] Iliza!
translation.ja: イライザ！

translation.en: [gasps] Leave us alone.
translation.ja: ほっといて

translation.en: [yelling] I don't know who you are anymore!
translation.ja: 君が分からない

translation.en: ♪ You've got feet... ♪
translation.ja: すてきな足

translation.en: Cats don't get songs.
translation.ja: 猫はダメだ

translation.en: ♪ Cat feet, high in the sky ♪
translation.ja: 猫の足が 空高く…

translation.en: [cries] I can't be here.
translation.ja: 耐えられない

translation.en: You gotta get back out there, kid.
translation.ja: ステージに戻れ

translation.en: There's dogs everywhere
translation.ja: 犬は至る所にいる

translation.en: who need to hear the nonsense you sing.
translation.ja: 君のバカな曲を求めてるんだ

translation.en: ...and an unbelievable comeback.
translation.ja: そして 奇跡のカムバックへ

translation.en: [small voice] Iliza? Yes!
translation.ja: イライザ　そうだよ

translation.en: It's me! [inhales sharply]
translation.ja: パンパンだ

translation.en: You can do this. I believe in you.
translation.ja: 君ならできるよ　頑張って

translation.en: If I'm a tiny dog, then you're...
translation.ja: 僕が小さな犬なら 君は―

translation.en: a big person.
translation.ja: 大きな人間だ

translation.en: [narrator] The inspiring story of one of the most iconic voices in music.
translation.ja: 世界一 美しい声の感動的な物語 世界一 美しい声の感動的な物語 〝見事な歌声〞

translation.en: ♪ All the tiny... ♪
translation.ja: すべての小さな―

translation.en: ♪ Dogs! ♪
translation.ja: 犬たちへ 「すべての小さな　犬たちへ」

translation.en: [screeching] ♪ Dogs! ♪
translation.ja: 犬！

translation.en: Why does she need a band?
translation.ja: バンドは不要だ

translation.en: [male narrator] The world is a dangerous place.
translation.ja: 世界には多くの危険が潜む

translation.en: -[point scrapes] -From natural disasters,
translation.ja: 世界には多くの危険が潜む 自然災害に発砲事件

translation.en: to gun violence and more,
translation.ja: 自然災害に発砲事件

translation.en: -[people screaming] -tragedy could strike -[explodes] -any time.
translation.ja: いつでも悲劇が起こり得る

translation.en: It's important to stay informed, so you can stay safe.
translation.ja: 緊急事態を警告してくれる―

translation.en: What if there was an app that warned you about emergencies...
translation.ja: アプリがあれば助かるはずだ

translation.en: ...with up-to-the-minute notifications to keep you out of harm's way?
translation.ja: 随時 更新される情報で危険を察知

translation.en: -Introducing Mom Alert. -[fun music plays]
translation.ja: 〝空港で事件〞 ママアラートだ

translation.en: Breaking news on the biggest threats from a team of moms with their fingers on the pulse.
translation.ja: 母親たちのチームが災害や事件の情報を速報する

translation.en: I can get back to my journaling now.
translation.ja: 安心して日記が書けるわ

translation.en: "Salmonella outbreak in Italy. Dirty shrimp.
translation.ja: “イタリアでサルモネラ菌が発生”

translation.en: Please stay safe."
translation.ja: “注意して”

translation.en: Phew!
translation.ja: ほっとした

translation.en: [narrator] Just plug in your location to start getting updates about emergencies within the radius of the entire Earth.
translation.ja: 自分の位置を設置すると全世界の情報が通知される

translation.en: You can even customize your preferences by type of tragedy,
translation.ja: 知りたい事態の種類を選択でき―

translation.en: -[alarm beeps] -and then continue to receive alerts
translation.ja: 〝マレーシアで津波〞 どれを選んでも常に全事態の情報が届く

translation.en: about all of them, no matter what you pick.
translation.ja: どれを選んでも常に全事態の情報が届く

translation.en: I was all set to go on my honeymoon in Italy.
translation.ja: 新婚旅行を取りやめた

translation.en: Then Mom Alerts told me about my cousin being robbed in Toronto one time.
translation.ja: 親戚が強盗に襲われたと通知が来たの

translation.en: [exhales sharply] I dodged that bullet.
translation.ja: おかげで私は無事

translation.en: I travel a lot for work.
translation.ja: 私は出張が多いわ

translation.en: On a recent trip to Colorado, Mom Alerts reminded me about JonBenét Ramsey.
translation.ja: コロラドでは24年前の殺人事件を思い出した

translation.en: Thank God.
translation.ja: アラートに感謝ね

translation.en: If it wasn't for Mom Alerts,
translation.ja: ママアラートのおかげで

translation.en: I wouldn't know about my mom's friend Jody's son, the one who went to Tups.
translation.ja: ジュディの息子について知ることができた

translation.en: He got his moles checked. He's fine.
translation.ja: メラノーマ検査を受けたって

translation.en: [narrator] Our moms are working around the clock, ready whenever, wherever, to send you instant alerts
translation.ja: 情報を即座に伝えるために母親たちが24時間体制で勤務

translation.en: as soon as the news breaks,
translation.ja: 我々が忘れかけた昔の出来事も あえて警告 我々が忘れかけた昔の出来事も あえて警告 〝テッド･バンディ〞

translation.en: and delayed warnings that come several years later
translation.ja: 我々が忘れかけた昔の出来事も あえて警告 〝テッド･バンディ〞 我々が忘れかけた昔の出来事も あえて警告

translation.en: about something they kind of remember.
translation.ja: 我々が忘れかけた昔の出来事も あえて警告

translation.en: Life-or-death news alerts
translation.ja: 生死に関わる情報以外にも 生死に関わる情報以外にも 〝レーズンを購入〞

translation.en: the way you want them,
translation.ja: 生死に関わる情報以外にも 〝レーズンを購入〞

translation.en: sandwiched between cryptic, mundane updates
translation.ja: 〝ダラスで火災〞 平々凡々で不可解な情報の受信も可能 平々凡々で不可解な情報の受信も可能

translation.en: about other things.
translation.ja: 平々凡々で不可解な情報の受信も可能 〝ジョアンを？〞

translation.en: And sign up for Mom Alert Premium to hear audio warnings with even more detail.
translation.ja: プレミアム通知なら音声警告も受けられる

translation.en: [woman] Valeria said it has a bad battery.
translation.ja: 記事を読んだけど電池のせいだと思うわ

translation.en: Or something. I don't remember.
translation.ja: 記事を読んだけど電池のせいだと思うわ 誰かの口の中で爆発したそう

translation.en: And it exploded in someone's mouth.
translation.ja: 誰かの口の中で爆発したそう

translation.en: Blew up their whole head. Or something like that.
translation.ja: どうやら頭が吹っ飛んだみたい

translation.en: It's a lawsuit. Did you see this?
translation.ja: 訴訟になったって話よ

translation.en: Anyway, just calling to make sure that you don't have that toothbrush.
translation.ja: ところで例の歯ブラシは持ってる？

translation.en: Thanks, Mom Alerts?
translation.ja: これが便利なの？

translation.en: [narrator] And coming soon, Dad Alert.
translation.ja: パパアラートも配信予定

translation.en: -[phone beeps] -[man] Hey, buddy.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: It's just this message. Twice a day. Nothing else.
translation.ja: この通知が１日に２回 届くだけだ

translation.en: Wow! We made that. Huh?
translation.ja: すばらしいＣＭになった

translation.en: Wow! Right?
translation.ja: 本当にすごいだろ？

translation.en: I mean, goes without saying, and yet here I am saying it, we are so pleased with how this campaign is being received.
translation.ja: 言うまでもないことだが僕は人々の反応に満足してる

translation.en: Right? Bridget, do you care to walk us through some of the roll-out details?
translation.ja: ブリジット詳細を説明してくれ

translation.en: [chuckles] So, we launched last month across digital,
translation.ja: 先月からキャンペーンを展開した

translation.en: traditional, streaming, and even print.
translation.ja: 映像だけではなく印刷物も使用してね

translation.en: -[woman] Ooh! -[Bridget laughs] It was a bold strategy, but the numbers are really paying off.
translation.ja: 大胆な戦略だけどいい数字が出てるわ

translation.en: -Incredible. -[Bridget] Okay! [laughs]
translation.ja: 最高だね

translation.en: That is really exciting stuff. -[Bridget] I'll take it. -That is really exciting stuff.
translation.ja: 今後 どうなるか本当に楽しみだ

translation.en: Now, who we're dealing with here, you know, they're a high premium brand.
translation.ja: この顧客は一流の高級ブランドだぞ

translation.en: And so, success here... [crunches into nectarine]
translation.ja: 絶対に成功させて―

translation.en: [muffled] It means that... that we can work with those kinds of high caliber brands.
translation.ja: 高級ブランドに対応できると世間にアピールしよう

translation.en: That's exactly what I was thinking. If I could just jump in for a second.
translation.ja: 割り込んで悪いが僕も同感だ

translation.en: We've had some fantastic calls with Martin's head, uh, you know,
translation.ja: マーティンズヘッド社が関心を持ってる

translation.en: -and Traegus Solutions. -[Bridget] Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: トレーガス社もね

translation.en: And if we circle back next week, I think we can close those deals.
translation.ja: 来週 連絡すれば契約が結べるかも

translation.en: And I would add Hodge to that list, too.
translation.ja: ホッジ社も興味を示してるわ

translation.en: Hunter and I had a great conversation with them last month,
translation.ja: ホッジ社も興味を示してるわ 先月 前向きな話ができたの

translation.en: and I wanna circle back with them 'cause I think they're really ready
translation.ja: 先月 前向きな話ができたの きっと依頼を検討してるはず

translation.en: to do some business.
translation.ja: きっと依頼を検討してるはず

translation.en: [muffled] Thank you, Sonia. I love to know that.
translation.ja: ソニア　朗報ね

translation.en: [muffled] No problem.
translation.ja: そう願うわ

translation.en: [muffled] Oh, this is gonna come as no surprise to all you guys, but... it all comes back to the creator.
translation.ja: このキャンペーンの考案者に感謝しないとな

translation.en: You know? Chris, congrats again on that.
translation.ja: クリス　ありがとう

translation.en: I wonder if you wanna talk... You know, from a content perspective, about... [chews loudly] how that went down?
translation.ja: コンテンツ的な視点から現在の状況を説明してくれ

translation.en: We were really working with... a great team of creatives,
translation.ja: 制作担当者たちはみんな 才能がある

translation.en: -who I think totally got the product. -[group slurps and chews loudly]
translation.ja: それに商品を完璧に理解してるよ

translation.en: [muffled] Sonia... Were you able to connect with the client?
translation.ja: ソニア　顧客と話したか？

translation.en: Not since last week, uh, but... [muffled] I'm gonna see Kathy at the event on Tuesday.
translation.ja: 先週から話してないけど火曜日にキャシーと会う

translation.en: I'm gonna circle around with her to see if they're still ready to engage.
translation.ja: その時にいろいろ確認するわ

translation.en: -[woman] If I could just chime in here... -[chews loudly]
translation.ja: １つ言わせてくれる？

translation.en: [muffled] This has no doubt been a success on so many levels, all right?
translation.ja: このキャンペーンは確かに大成功だけど―

translation.en: -But, from a sales perspective, -[nectarine thuds] I think that we can do better in Q3.
translation.ja: 第３四半期にはもっと売上を伸ばせるはず

translation.en: What we need to do is increase the money for these types of projects specifically.
translation.ja: こういうプロジェクトにはもっと予算が必要だわ

translation.en: [muffled] I wanna say...
translation.ja: この契約は―

translation.en: it's possible that this deal pre-dates our new sales goals.
translation.ja: 新たな売上目標を提示してるのかも

translation.en: -Or at least, -[nectarine thuds] will be made more explicit.
translation.ja: 目標をより具体的にできない？

translation.en: [muffled] And we can go granular on that on the sales call on Friday.
translation.ja: 金曜日の会議で話し合おう

translation.en: I'll make a note of that.
translation.ja: メモする

translation.en: Here's the thing...
translation.ja: 実は…

translation.en: -[nectarine splats] -Just real quick, Hunter and Hoyt,
translation.ja: ハンターにホイト

translation.en: if you guys can't hear us right now,
translation.ja: 私たちの声が聞きにくいなら―

translation.en: it's because we're on this end digging into some fabulous...
translation.ja: 私たちの声が聞きにくいなら― それはネクタリンのせいよ

translation.en: -nectarines. So tasty, -[nectarine thuds]
translation.ja: それはネクタリンのせいよ 超おいしくて軟らかくて―

translation.en: so supple, so fresh.
translation.ja: 超おいしくて軟らかくて―

translation.en: -Really, really juicy. -[man mumbles]
translation.ja: 超ジューシーなの

translation.en: -[Bridget] Oh! -Oh, my God!
translation.ja: 最高よね

translation.en: -[thuds] -[Hoyt, muffled] It isn't an issue here. We're hearing you loud and clear.
translation.ja: 問題ないよはっきり聞こえる

translation.en: Thanks, Hoyt. Hunter?
translation.ja: ハンターは？

translation.en: [Hunter, muffled] Same situation here.
translation.ja: 我々もネクタリンを食べてる

translation.en: We've had ourselves [mumbling]. Just let us know
translation.ja: 我々もネクタリンを食べてる 問題があるなら言ってくれ

translation.en: -[thuds] -if our nectarines become an issue.
translation.ja: 問題があるなら言ってくれ

translation.en: They haven't. It's been fine.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　問題ない

translation.en: Okay, great, then we're all on the same page.
translation.ja: 意思疎通できてるわね

translation.en: Actually, Hunter, now might be a really good time
translation.ja: ハンター　質問したい

translation.en: to get some developments of what's going on your end, so...
translation.ja: シンガポールの件はどうなった？

translation.en: What's new in Singapore, brother?
translation.ja: 何か展開は？

translation.en: [Hunter] We've gone on really good meetings out here.
translation.ja: 順調に会議を進めてる

translation.en: I wouldn't say anything was closed, but I would say [chuckles]
translation.ja: まだ取引は成立(クローズ )してないが―

translation.en: -we're close. -[sputters and laughs]
translation.ja: きっと もうすぐ(クロース)だろう

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
translation.ja: マジかよ　面白すぎる！

translation.en: -[Chris] Oh, my God. -Ah...
translation.ja: 腹が痛い

translation.en: [man] I think that's enough updates for the afternoon.
translation.ja: 今日はここまでだ

translation.en: I just wanna be the first to thank you all for giving us time today.
translation.ja: 貴重な時間を割いてくれてありがとう

translation.en: -It was our pleasure! Our pleasure. -[group mumbles]
translation.ja: どういたしまして

translation.en: That's what we're here for. [laughs]
translation.ja: 会社のためよ

translation.en: [yelling] Iliza! Brett!
translation.ja: ブレット　来い

translation.en: -Can we get y'all in here? -[Sonia] Here we go. Hit me, baby.
translation.ja: 頼むぞ 私にもお願いね　水をかけて

translation.en: -Hello! -[man] Hit me, hit me!
translation.ja: 私にもお願いね　水をかけて

translation.en: Baby?
translation.ja: ねえ

translation.en: I just don't think we can afford a trip this year.
translation.ja: 今年は旅行する余裕がない

translation.en: [scoffs] Babe. You know I need a vacation.
translation.ja: でも休暇が必要よ

translation.en: I know. This is garbage.
translation.ja: 分かるけど 全部 高すぎる

translation.en: Wait, what is this?
translation.ja: 待って　これは？

translation.en: Paula, look. Come over here. This is insane.
translation.ja: ポーラ　見てくれる？

translation.en: -Hmm? -London for $100.
translation.ja: ロンドンが100ドルよ

translation.en: -What? -Round trip to Maui, -$55. -Wow.
translation.ja: マウイ島は往復で55ドル

translation.en: Two hundred dollars to Shanghai? Ibiza? [exaggerated French accent] Paris?
translation.ja: 上海は200ドルでイビサ島やパリも安いわ

translation.en: -[Paula] Uh, that's amazing. -Do we love?
translation.ja: すごいわね 本当に びっくりよ

translation.en: [exaggerated] It's amazing.
translation.ja: 本当に びっくりよ

translation.en: Yeah. So, okay, wait, wait, wait. What does the fine print say?
translation.ja: ちょっと待って条件を見ましょ

translation.en: -"Some restrictions apply." Okay. -Okay.
translation.ja: “制限あり”ですって

translation.en: "Posted fees include tax and do not include additional bag charges.
translation.ja: “税込みで手荷物料金は含まれない”

translation.en: Also, you may have to kiss your dad for six whole minutes? Blackout dates apply.
translation.ja: “父親へのキスが必要になる可能性がある”

translation.en: You and your best friend have to get matching haircuts.
translation.ja: “友達と髪形を同じにすること”

translation.en: Extended leg room offered at an additional charge.
translation.ja: “友達と髪形を同じにすること” “足元の広い座席は追加料金”

translation.en: You can only bring one carry-on bag and it must be a hamster.
translation.ja: “足元の広い座席は追加料金” “手荷物はハムスターのみ”

translation.en: No food is allowed on the flight unless you bring enough for everyone.
translation.ja: “食べ物は乗客全員分を持ち込むこと”

translation.en: Anyone who says the word "me" or "I" or "plane"
translation.ja: “食べ物は乗客全員分を持ち込むこと” “「私」と「飛行機」は禁句言ったらスープ攻めに遭う”

translation.en: will be doused in soup."
translation.ja: “「私」と「飛行機」は禁句言ったらスープ攻めに遭う”

translation.en: -Uh-- -I'm thinking...
translation.ja: やめましょ

translation.en: -no. -Let's go for it. -[plane hums] -Obviously.
translation.ja: いいえ　買うべきだわ

translation.en: -[intercom chimes] -[woman] Thank you and we do hope you have a good flight.
translation.ja: ご搭乗ありがとうございます

translation.en: -I'm so glad we did this. -Aw.
translation.ja: 買ってよかった

translation.en: -[French accent] Paris, baby. -[giggles]
translation.ja: パリよ　楽しみね

translation.en: [sighs] I'm glad we're almost halfway there. I'm just gonna, like, grab a little shuteye.
translation.ja: もうすぐ中間点よ少し眠るわ

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. Do you, babe. -Yeah, baby.
translation.ja: ええ　おやすみ

translation.en: [jovial, thin voice] Hello! And welcome!
translation.ja: こんにちは　ようこそ！

translation.en: I'm Cashew Albacore, CEO and inventor of Air Cashew,
translation.ja: 俺はアルバコアだカシュー航空のＣＥＯだよ

translation.en: the world's first airline owned by just me.
translation.ja: この航空会社を所有するのは俺だけだ

translation.en: I hope you love adventure because it's time to flew.
translation.ja: 冒険の旅だぞみんなで飛ぼう

translation.en: -After 30 years... -[mouths] What? ...in the rat and mustard business,
translation.ja: 俺はドブネズミ産業で大成功を収め―

translation.en: I saved up enough money to buy my own airline.
translation.ja: 航空会社を買うことができた

translation.en: -Me even designed the uniforms. -[curtains rustle] Spiffo!
translation.ja: 従業員の制服も俺のデザインだ

translation.en: Beverage? We have hot soda and warm hair.
translation.ja: 熱いソーダと温かい毛はいかが？

translation.en: -No, thank you. -Ew.
translation.ja: 結構よ

translation.en: We're committed to staying in the air once we've taken off.
translation.ja: 不時着しないように全力を尽くす

translation.en: -[trumpets blow] -And now, it's Pine Cone Time!
translation.ja: では 松ぼっくりの時間だ！

translation.en: [Cashew] Our air is different -[air vents hiss] -from other airlines,
translation.ja: 我が社は他の航空会社とは違うが

translation.en: [sing-songy] but I won't tell you how.
translation.ja: どう違うかは教えないぞ

translation.en: -[both] We're gonna die! -[Cashew] Gonna die.
translation.ja: 死ぬの？

translation.en: Your words, not mine.
translation.ja: セーフだ“私”と言わなかった

translation.en: I prefer words like
translation.ja: 俺が好きな言葉は“トリュフ豚”

translation.en: truffle pig, hot scrod, goose dust,
translation.ja: 俺が好きな言葉は“トリュフ豚” “熱い白身魚”“ガチョウ粉”

translation.en: -We're gonna die. -and the Spanish word for dream, sueño.
translation.ja: スペイン語で“夢”を意味する“スエニョ”

translation.en: It took a big, hot sueño to sew this plane together.
translation.ja: 大きなスエニョを持って飛行機の部品を縫い合わせた

translation.en: -Sew? -[Cashew] So,
translation.ja: 縫い合わせた？

translation.en: all our planes are homemade and FDA-certified, nom nom.
translation.ja: 部品はすべて食品医薬品局に認可されてる

translation.en: I tried to buy my own sports team,
translation.ja: 本当はスポーツチームを買いたかった

translation.en: but no one wanted to be called the Denver Doodles of Nashville.
translation.ja: でも改名するチームがなく諦めたよ

translation.en: [playfully] So I turned my sights to the skies.
translation.ja: それで空を目指すことにした

translation.en: I can't believe this is happening.
translation.ja: 私 夢みてる？

translation.en: -[alarm beeps] -Did you say "I"?
translation.ja: “私”と言ったな

translation.en: -[curtains rustle] -Danni, -in 3C. -[soup splats]
translation.ja: ３Ｃに座ってるダニー

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ

translation.en: [Cashew] Better not complain, or we'll have to wake up the pilot.
translation.ja: 文句を言ったらパイロットを起こすぞ

translation.en: -[trumpets blow] -Just kidding! It's me,
translation.ja: 冗談さ　俺だ

translation.en: and welcome to Cashew Air,
translation.ja: カシュー航空だぞ

translation.en: the only airline where you can earn...
translation.ja: 点数を稼げる唯一の航空会社だ

translation.en: So, fasten your meatbelts,
translation.ja: さあ　肉ベルトを締めて―

translation.en: -[intercom chimes] -and go to sleep,
translation.ja: 眠れ！

translation.en: -[item thuds] -because you're on Cashew Air. Cashew Air!
translation.ja: 君はカシュー航空の飛行機に乗ってる

translation.en: -Something is wrong with me. -[intercom chimes]
translation.ja: 俺は おかしいようだ
